mapper.sql: a.ID_PROFILE_TABLE AS profileTableId , a.REPOSITORY_NAME AS repositoryName , a.ID_DATABASE AS databaseId , a.ID_PROFIEL_TABLE_GROUP AS profielTableGroupId , a.PROFIEL_NAME AS profielName , a.PROFIEL_DESC AS profielDesc , a.SCHEMA_NAME AS schemaName , a.TABLE_NAME AS tableName , a.CONDITION AS condition , a.CREATE_TIME AS createTime , a.USER_ID AS userId , a.TABLE_NAME_TAG AS tableNameTag , a.CREATE_USER AS createUser , a.UPDATE_USER AS updateUser , a.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime , a.DEL_FLAG AS delFlag
